pages.text: Gentle resonances are amplified by $(l:general/shards#onyx)Onyx$(/l) to such an extent that they can even be measured through walls, given a suitable receiver.$(br)Based on your previous experiments with gemstone shards, it was easy for you to devise such transmitter and receiver systems.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: Use with empty hands to toggle sending/receiving. When in receiving mode, the output is directional. Change the frequency by using dye/pigment. Range: 16 blocks.
